title: NA transfer to OCE Client Buggy?
body: Client went buggy when I transferred to OCE...

replies.body: Same thing here. It's very annoying. Sometimes I can access Item sets but everything is simply unreadable.

Same problem for me idk how to paste image but I cant choose my runes because they're enlarged af that I cant even drag it as well as all my champions and match history seem to disappear when I go to summoner profile also there seems to be a problem with chat as it also disappears and displays **Chat Text Input when I completely typed something different. Helpppp!!!
I just transferred yesterday and my client has the exact same issue. I tried repairing it but nothing happens.

Turns out we needed to keep playing games till our match History is full till then don't click Match History. I found that even viewing someones match history (that has transferred) with no matches can screw up your own client.
